name: Ye-jin Han
what_you_do: Ye-Jin Han is a passionate violinist who performs classical music and teaches violin lessons.
who_you_serve: Ye-Jin Han serves classical music audiences and aspiring violin students.
social_proof: Ye-Jin Han has made her Carnegie Hall performance debut, earned a doctorate in Violin Performance, and is the winner of national and international violin competitions.
niche: classical music, violin performance, violin teaching
business_focus: Ye-Jin Han is a professional violinist and violin teacher who aims to bring the beauty of classical music to as many people as possible through her performances and teaching.
